Posts.EditableText: I noticed that people were complaining of issues with the website yesterday (9/19/23). It seems that the server is down today, or something. Squiffy and HTML games seem to work fine, but all Quest games error out. Any response from admins on the issue?

If the error hit the help system the mods may not even know something is wrong unless they spot it on the forums...
